name: hidden_files
pattern: {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/home/%%/.%') OR (fi.path like '/root/.%')) AND type='regular';", "interval": 3600, "description": "Lists hidden file in relevant path - ATT&CK T1158,T1100"}
